overview_description.description:
Arrecife Systems is an energy company that focuses in the field of fluids mechanics for over 25 years, experimenting on the design of turbines and airfoils. This led to improvements applicable in the fields of aerodynamics and hydrodynamics.

​​

Combining his research with the observation of Nature, Prof. Doria noted that tiny living corals occupy vast extensions, forming a reef able to absorb much of the energy of waves in an efficient manner. This led to the idea of ​​creating direct action turbines placed in series, being them composed of many blades simulating a coral reef.

about_short_description.short_description: Arrecife Systems is an energy company that focuses in the field of fluids mechanics, experimenting on the design of turbines and airfoils.

product.name: Patented technology for energy generation
product.description: Technology that harnesses energy from waves, currents, and wind using a multi-turbine cross-flow system with a direct generator, installable at various depths.

product.name: 75kW system - Open sea test
product.description: A test conducted in open sea conditions to evaluate the performance of a 75kW energy generation system.

product.name: Deep sea test
product.description: Evaluation of technology performance in deep sea conditions, conducted in the Cantabrian sea at a 1:10th scale.

product.name: Lab test
product.description: Performance testing of technology in controlled laboratory conditions, conducted at the IH Laboratory of the University of Cantabria at a 1:10th scale.

product.name: Small power ocean test
product.description: A test to evaluate the technology's performance in generating power from ocean waves and currents on a small scale.

product.name: Small river test
product.description: A test to assess the technology's capability to generate energy from river currents on a small scale.
